body: I just graduated college with my second degree, AND my birthday is September 2nd! I needed to tell the avicus world so all here can revel in my victory!
body_tagged: I just graduated college with my second degree, AND my birthday is September 2nd! I needed to tell the avicus world so all here can revel in my victory!
title: BIG NEWS IN MY LIFE

replies.body:
Grat on the College degree and have a great Birthday :)! However, personal updates aren't allowed on the forums, unfortunately. Therefore, locking thread...
